Name: Invite Friend
ActivityDes: You can share your invite code to Lv.≥20 commandants. If they use your code, you will have invited them successfully.

Name: Invite Code
ActivityDes: Welcome back to Gray Raven HQ. You can input the invite code of other commandants to receive corresponding rewards.

Name: Return Support
ActivityDes: During the event, commandants in the "Return" state can complete the missions and get the rewards (the event ends when the Return state expires).

Name: Veiled Rift
ActivityDes: Instructions: Complete event missions to obtain [Key of Truth].

Name: A Covenant of Glass
ActivityDes: Event Info: Complete event missions to obtain [Crystal-Heart Plush].

Name: Character Leap - Luminance
ActivityDes: Instructions: Experience the new powers brought about by Leap in the tutorial stage.

Name: Across the Ruined Sea
ActivityDes: Event Info: Play through the new event story [Across the Ruined Sea] and complete missions.

Name: Cursed Waves
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.70

Info:
1. Cursed Waves is a permanently available game mode with 3 endings upon its first launch. More endings will be added irregularly in future updates.
2. In this game mode, you can get [Downfall Crystals] for leveling up in the [Curse Queller's Path] and gaining rewards. More rewards will be added irregularly in future updates.

Name: Guild Expedition II
ActivityDes:
Requirements:
Join the Command Bureau to participate.

Info:
1. Join forces with your Command Bureau members to defeat the final bosses, 2 Shark-speare.
2. Take note that the Outposts will be closer to the Base because of Shark-speare.
3. Clear all Guard Nodes to commence Operation Dangerous Cliff; meanwhile, Shark-speare's countdown will also begin. When the countdown is up, Shark-speare will attack the Base.
4. All rewards can be obtained by completing missions. Make sure to claim and exchange them for items in the shop before the event ends.
5. After defeating 2 Shark-speare, you can continue fighting to further enhance your Bureau's final ranking.
6. 70 Expedition Supplies will be given every day. You can store up to 210 Expedition Supplies in total.

Name: Babel Tower: Triumphant Tide
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.60

Event Info:
1. Babel Tower is a set of high-difficulty stages.
2. Each stage has its own affixes, which will change the way the stage works.
3. You can select different strategic targets each stage. They will increase the difficulty of combat.
4. You can select affixes for stages. The affixes can aid you in combat.
5. The characters you used to complete the stages will be locked and become unavailable in other stages.
6. You will earn collectible rewards for joining Babel Tower. Your final strategic level will earn you different resource rewards and improve the collectible's quality.

Name: Exodus Memoria
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. There are a total of 5 difficulty levels, all of which are highly challenging with [Lithos] being your formidable enemy.
2. All members will be reset upon death during the challenge, making the challenge easier to complete.
3. Each stage has its own 3-star clearance conditions. Collectibles will be rewarded once you have earned a total of 3 stars. The more stars you earn, the higher the quality of the collectibles will be.

Name: Midsummer Memento
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. This event requires a total of 3 players to play.
2. There are 3 maps available in this event, each with both Cooperation and PVP Mode. Players will be a team in the Cooperation Mode and opponents in the PVP Mode.
3. In this event, the closer your character is to the camera, the higher score you will reach. Each mode has its own extra points bonuses.
4. Complete the event missions for different rewards and a limited collectible, Sunshiny Memories. Let's make unforgettable memories together!

Name: Starry Conversations
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Gain Astro-Mystery Boxes by playing poker guessing in Starry Conversations and completing missions.
2. On the Character Story screen in Starry Conversations, you can gift different characters Astro-Mystery Boxes to unlock and view their Double Seventh Festival story.
3. The hint function has been added to poker guessing. Now you can use it to find out whether the next card is higher or lower.

Name: Abyssal Voyage
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. You can obtain event tokens by clearing a stage. Some stages may drop random Memories.
2. Event tokens can be used to purchase items from the event shop.
3. Clearing a stage will earn you Challenge EXP. Your Authority Level will be increased when you earn a certain amount of Challenge EXP. Increased Authority Level will grant Battle bonuses including damage increase.
(Note: Those bonuses can be applied to Abyssal Voyage stages only.)

Name: Omniframe Target
ActivityDes:
New Omniframe:
※S-Rank Physical Attacker [Bianca: Stigmata]
New Weapon:
※6★ [Hecate] (Swordstaff)

Info:
1. Character Research:
※[Bianca: Stigmata] will be available in the [Themed Research] Pool. 
You have a 100% chance to get [Bianca: Stigmata] when they 
get an S-Rank character.
2. Weapon Research:
※[Hecate] will be available in the [Weapon Target] Research Pool
with the same rules and rates as other weapons.

Name: CUB Target
ActivityDes:
New CUB:
※S-Rank CUB [Shimmer]
※Recommended partner: [Bianca: Stigmata]

Info:
1. CUB Description:
(Active Skill) [Swirl Blast - Physical]: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Shimmer will dash toward the target for DMG and pull in the enemies with a beam to inflict DMG on enemies within range using its laser cannon.

(Active Skill) [Gliding Barrage - Physical]: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Shimmer will dash toward the target for DMG and shoot 3 laser beams, each dealing DMG to enemies within range.

(Special Passive) [Luster Splitter]: After Shimmer casts its Active Skill, its carrier's ATK increases. Can be stacked up to 2 times.

(Special Passive) [Voidrays Convergence]: When Bianca: Stigmata carries Shimmer, her CRIT DMG will increase and Sword Dance will deal increased Base DMG while Luminous Realm is activated; Bianca: Stigmata's upward thrust attack will summon Shimmer to cast its basic Active Skill for a combination strike.
2. CUB Research:
※[Shimmer] will enter the [CUB Research] pool.
You may select an S-Rank CUB as the target in CUB Research.
During the event, if you select [Shimmer] as the target, it will be guaranteed when you draw an S-Rank CUB.

ActivityDes:

The Coating Research will require [Woven Dream's Aurora].
[Dreamcatcher] is guaranteed within 10 pulls.

during the event.

Name: Tactical Assessment Manual
ActivityTitle: Tactical Assessment Manual - The Sea Foam File
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info
1. Accumulate Intel Value by completing the Rate Missions of the Daily, Weekly, and current Intel Manual.
2. Raise the Rating Level by reaching the required Intel Value.
3. You will obtain the corresponding reward upon reaching the required Rating Level.
4. You can also purchase additional Intel to get better rewards.

Name: Reborn Resolve
ActivityDes: Requirements: Clear Normal Story 2-4

Name: Adaptation Fitting: Shimmer
ActivityDes: Requirements: Commandant Lv.61

ActivityDes: New Coating:\nOmniframe [Liv: Empyrea] Coating [Dreamcatcher]

Name: Astral: Leap Tutorial
ActivityDes: Instructions: Experience the new powers brought about by Leap in the tutorial stage.

Name: Guild Expedition
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Join a Command Bureau

Event Info:
1. Guild Expedition will come with the next update. Be prepared!
2. Join a Command Bureau and defeat the final boss to clear the event.
3. The duo-formed Shark-speare will appear at the final stage and take turns to disrupt you in battle.
4. The Dangerous Cliff has been buffed. Break it in time, or it will threaten your base.

Name: Oath of Purity
ActivityDes: Instructions: Consume a certain amount of Serum to complete missions and claim rewards.

Name: Operation Uniframe
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.52

Event Info: 
1. This event has 2 phases that are independent of each other.
2. Each phase consists of 3 Combat Area and 1 Central Area.
3. A large number of enemies with new features will be introduced in the stages. Tap into the features of different zones to cope.
4. Clearing the stages in a Combat Area increase its Energy Supply Level.
5. Each Area grants additional points to the Central Area based on its Energy Supply Level.

Name: Roamer Records
ActivityDes: Requirements: Clear Normal Story Mission 2-4

Name: New Decor
ActivityDes:
Decor Set:
1. Memory Lane Decor Blueprint at 20 Rainbow Cards.
※Contains: 1 of each Decor Blueprint in the Set for a total of 19.
2. Decor Set at 68 Rainbow Cards.
※Contains: Set Blueprint Bundle x3, Finished Decor, and Set Decor Self Select Blueprint x20.
3. Decor Template Set at 68 Rainbow Cards.
※Contains: Template Dormitory - all A-Rank Decor set that has 40 pieces of Decors.

Name: Deed of Snow Leopard
ActivityDes: New Coating: Omniframe [Karenina: Ember]: [Deed of Snow Leopard]

Name: Egg Hawker
ActivityDes:
A mysterious hawker is selling Easter eggs. 
What? Commandant can get R&D Tickets from the eggs?!
 But how many tickets will you get? Let's find out!

1. During the event, complete event mission [Easter Egg Hunter] to get event coins.
2. Exchange [Egg Coins] for various Easter eggs. 
Use Easter eggs to get random rewards.
3. Exchange [Bunny Coins] for Bunny Pots. Use Bunny Pots to get Decors.
4. All event-related items will be recycled once expired, please use them in time. Coins will expire at UTC 06:59, 4/15 ;
 3 types of Easter Eggs and Bunny Clay Pot will expire at UTC 06:59, 4/22

(Tap Go to get to Exchange Shop)

Name: Egg Hunter
ActivityDes: Event Info: Complete following missions to collect [Egg Coin] and [Bunny Coin], then exchange items in [Easter Hawker] Shop.

Name: Azure Apocalypse
ActivityDes: Instructions: Experience the special Coating [Azure Apocalypse].

2. [Azure Apocalypse] is guaranteed in 10 pulls.
3. After the event, the corresponding coating will be taken off the shelf.

Name: Norman Revival Plan
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.60.

Event Info:
1. Each phase lasts 14 days, and you will enter the Battle phase when any stage is cleared in the first 4 days (or automatically enter the Battle phase after the first 4 days). The Battle phase lasts 10 days.
2. During the preparation phase, Lv.60-84 players will automatically enter the "qualifying battle", while players of Lv.85 and above can choose between "ordinary battle" and "pioneer battle".
3. "Ordinary battle" and "pioneer battle" are of the same difficulty. Ordinary battle gives more electricity but fewer rewards, while pioneer battle gives less electricity but more rewards.
4. The Cover Tactic will be unlocked on the third day of the Battle phase. Clear the stage to obtain Electricity and item rewards.
5. A battle will be conducted in form of multiple teams playing at the same time, and the characters involved shall be selected in accordance with the battle environment.
6. Electricity is supplied by the Power Station. You may consume electricity on the Team page to increase your team's Battle Power.
7. After clearing a stage, you can obtain Autonomous Miners and Tantalum Ore. At the end of each day, the miners will also produce Tantalum Ore and grow by 50% of the current number of miners.
8. Tantalum Ore can be exchanged for rewards in the shop.
